item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: XO Cafe (formerly Cafe Noir, which WAS XO Steakhouse before that - lol!) It's across from Olives and next to Mills Tavern on N. Main St.

So they switched the name two years ago to Cafe Noir from XO Steakhouse, now they've  combined the name to XO Cafe. Cafe Noir was a French inspired restaurant with a distinctively cozy and comfortable European feel, and the decor is pretty much the same. The bar is large and the creative drinks and food are tasty. This is a good one to know about and they offer a Ladies Night (sorry, guys...) on Wednesdays that includes a three-course tasting menu with purchase of a drink. Its really THAT good and well worth it! We haven't been back since the summer, so, whether you've been there before, or you'd like to give it a try, or just go again to see what the changes are, its always a good time and let's check it out!

Jon chose this location because he is a self-professed wine snob and knows many of you enjoy some good vino, too. On Monday nites at XO all bottles of wine and champagne are 1/2 price! So go in on a bottle with your fellow Collective Members and have a great time!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Jon has graciously offered to host this one, please look at his picture!!!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - XO Cafe!!!!
